sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./FacterCar.css"; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const FasterCar = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [carTypes, setCarTypes] = useState([]); const [showMore, setShowMore] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { fetch("http://admin.monzarentcar.com/api/types") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setCarTypes(data); }) .catch((error) => { console.error("Error fetching data:", error); }); }, []); const handleViewMore = () => { setShowMore(!showMore); }; const images = [ "/lis1.webp", "/lis2.webp", "/lis3.webp", "/lis4.webp", "/lis5.webp", "/sports2.webp" ]; return (

{t('fasterCar.title')}

{t('fasterCar.subtitle')}

{t('fasterCar.description')}

{t('fasterCar.supercarTitle')}

{t('fasterCar.supercarDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.sportscarRentalTitle')}

{t('fasterCar.sportscarRentalDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.suvRentalTitle')}

{t('fasterCar.suvRentalDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.luxuryRentalTitle')}

{t('fasterCar.luxuryRentalDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.premiumTitle')}

{t('fasterCar.premiumDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.privateCarRental')}

{t('fasterCar.privateCarDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.businessCarRental')}

{t('fasterCar.businessCarDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.desertSafari')}

{t('fasterCar.desertSafariDescription')}

{t('fasterCar.weddingEventRental')}

{t('fasterCar.weddingEventDescription')}

); }; export default FasterCar;
